attributes.description:
For more information on this vehicle please contact 0872502066. **SERVICE PLAN: 2YR/30 000KM**
**FACTORY WARRANTY: 5YR/150 000KM**

Welcome to the world of the Renault KWID. 
The KWID’s design strategy symbolizes dynamic performance, robust strength and a taste for adventure. Its SUV-inspired stance offers a high driving position and greater visibility, making it ideal for zipping around in urban traffic or cruising down the open highway. Go ahead, make the most of every day. 

Contact us today. We deliver country wide, metallic color, licensing and Service & delivery fees are not included.
FREE INSURANCE FOR ONE YEAR.

From dusty farm roads to bustling city streets, there’s no better value for money than this Np300 to help you get the job done. It’s big, it’s tough and no matter what challenge you throw at it, this bakkie always seems to rise to the occasion. 

ENQUIRE NOW!

Extras - Nudge bar, Over Fenders, Roller Shutter, Smash and Grab, Tow Bar.

The perfect workhorse. This bakkie is big, it is tough and it is practical with enough space inside to be comfortable and a big loadbox. The Ranger is a beauty, lovely growl and very powerful engine. It will ensure that any job is completed whether it is carrying heavy loads, towing tons of gear or tackling tough terrains. 

Price excludes License, Reg, Doc & delivery fees. Trade in’s welcome.

We offer Extended Warranties/Service Plans/ Maintenance Plans.

THIS VEHICLE IS IN GREAT CONDITION. A MUST SEE!!
COME AND VIEW!
WE DELIVER COUNTRYWIDE, SERVICE THE WHOLE OF THE GAUTENG REGION AND WE ARE BASED JUST 40 MIN FROM JHB.

Why you must buy from Koos&Mike used cars:
1. Our Prices includes on the road cost.(CASH BUYS)

4. Paperwork is our priority and not your responsibility in our town.
